headline: This Stock Is Just Starting To Dazzle Amid Massive Gold Rally
summary: Newmont has risen along with other gold stocks amid fears that inflation may spike as President Donald Trump's tariffs roll out.  Shares are yet to carve out the handle after they rallied for five days and cleared their 50-day and 200-day moving averages.  Newmont shares are in an early-stage base that can lead to higher gains after a strong breakout.
